articles.author: Yosuke Osanai
articles.title: Do Newly Discovered Bacteria Hold the Key to Curbing Methane Emissions? - JAPAN Forward
articles.description: Japan is working to reduce emissions of the powerful greenhouse gas methane using newly discovered bacteria believed to help reduce the gas in cow burps.
articles.content:
